name: Stick to your Guns
description:
Punch 'em! Slice 'em! Blast 'em with a pistol! Or an SMG! Or...or a magnum, I guess! 

Stick it to the man, man!

Controls:

AD and L/R arrow keys to move

z or j to jump

x or k to attack.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(I made this game for Nokia 3310 Jam 5 in around 4 or so days and then buttoned things up before submitting. The whole thing is done in gbstudio so it's a little janky on the sprites here and there. I basically just started learning gbstudio so this jam made me learn a lot about the capabilities and limitations of the software.

It's more or less like snake but instead of being about a snake and being innovative and fun it's about being a stick person who has hands rated E for Everyone.)
